import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Modal from 'react-responsive-modal'; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { getRelatedItems } from "../../../services"; class AuctionItem extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { open: false, cartModalopen: false, stock: 'InStock', quantity: 1, image: '' } } onClickHandle(img) { this.setState({ image: img }); } onOpenModal = () => { this.setState({ open: true }); }; onCloseModal = () => { this.setState({ open: false }); }; onOpenCartModal = () => { this.setState({ cartModalopen: true }); this.props.onAddToCartClicked(); }; onCloseCartModal = () => { this.setState({ cartModalopen: false }); }; minusQty = () => { if (this.state.quantity > 1) { this.setState({ stock: 'InStock' }) this.setState({ quantity: this.state.quantity - 1 }) } } plusQty = () => { if (this.props.product.stock >= this.state.quantity) { this.setState({ quantity: this.state.quantity + 1 }) } else { this.setState({ stock: 'Out of Stock !' }) } } changeQty = (e) => { this.setState({ quantity: parseInt(e.target.value) }) } render() { const { product, symbol, onAddToCartClicked, onAddToWishlistClicked, onAddToCompareClicked, relatedItems } = this.props; let RatingStars = [] for (var i = 0; i < product.rating; i++) { RatingStars.push() } return (
{(product.new == true) ? new : ''} {(product.sale == true) ? on sale : ''}
{/*
*/}
{RatingStars}
{product.name}
{/*

{'฿'}{product.price-(product.price*product.discount/100)} {'฿'}{product.price}

*/}

25 : Days 22 : Hrs

{/*Quick-view modal popup Start*/}

{symbol}{product.price}

    {product.variants.map((vari, i) =>
  • this.onClickHandle(vari.images)}>
    • ) }
: ''}
product details

{product.shortDetails}

{product.size ?
    {product.size.map((size, i) => { return
  • {size}
    • })}
: ''}
quantity
view detail
{/*Quick-view modal popup End*/} {/* Add to cart modal popup start */}

Your cart Check out Continue shopping

Customers who bought this item also.

{relatedItems.map((item, i) =>
{item.name}

{symbol}{item.price}

)}
{/*Add to cart modal popup End*/}
) } } const mapStateToProps = (state, ownProps) => ({ relatedItems: getRelatedItems(state.data.products, ownProps.product.category), symbol: state.data.symbol }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(AuctionItem);
